187001. Austracist victory in war of Spanish succession

HSP — Not random

Conditions

  • Country is controlled by AI
  • Event 187000 - The parliament of Barcelona declares Charles King for HSP has already occurred
  • At least one of the following must occur:
    • Country has at least 10 non-colonial provinces
    • Spain is a vassal of Austria
    • France is a vassal of Austria
  • Spain exists
  • Austria exists
  • None of the following must occur:
    • Austria is a vassal of Spain
    • Austria is a vassal of France

Will happen within 100 days of October 10, 1706
Checked again every 100 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after April 18, 1711)

Description

A victory has been achieved by the Austracist party. Charles Habsburg has been accepted as King of Spain as Carlos III.

Actions

A. The Habsburgs won the civil war (End Game)

  • Stability +2
  • Event 285213 - Bourbonist defeat in war of Spanish succession for Spain is triggered immediately

187004. Austracist victory in war of Spanish succession

HSP — Not random

Conditions

  • Event 187000 - The parliament of Barcelona declares Charles King for HSP has already occurred
  • Country is controlled by human
  • At least one of the following must occur:
    • Country has at least 10 non-colonial provinces
    • Spain is a vassal of Austria
    • France is a vassal of Austria
  • Spain exists
  • Austria exists
  • None of the following must occur:
    • Austria is a vassal of Spain
    • Austria is a vassal of France

Will happen within 60 days of October 10, 1706
Checked again every 60 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after April 18, 1711)

Description

A victory has been achieved by the Austracist party. Charles Habsburg has been accepted as King of Spain as Carlos III.

Actions

A. We reunite Spain again

  • Stability +2
  • Inherit the realms of Spain
  • Event 187005 - Austrian rulers in Spain for HSP is triggered immediately

187005. Austrian rulers in Spain

HSP — Not random

Triggered by

Action A of 187004 - Austracist victory in war of Spanish succession for HSP

Description

Philippe d'Anjou has left the Kingdom and gone back to France, where he has been named Dauphin of France. Charles Habsburg has been accepted as King of Spain as Carlos III. The Austrian line of the Habsburg dynasty will continue ruling our now reunited country.

Actions

A. Good!

  • Menorca will be considered a claim province
  • Madeira will be considered a claim province
  • Gibraltar will be considered a claim province
  • Malaga will be considered a claim province
  • Granada will be considered a claim province
  • Andalucia will be considered a claim province
  • Cordoba will be considered a claim province
  • Murcia will be considered a claim province
  • La Mancha will be considered a claim province
  • Toledo will be considered a claim province
  • Extremadura will be considered a claim province
  • Salamanca will be considered a claim province
  • Castilla will be considered a national province
  • Burgos will be considered a claim province
  • Leon will be considered a national province
  • Galicia will be considered a claim province
  • Asturias will be considered a claim province
  • Viscaya will be considered a claim province
  • Navarra will be considered a claim province
  • Arago will be considered a claim province
  • Zaragoza will be considered a claim province
  • Valencia will be considered a claim province
  • Catalunya will be considered a claim province
  • Rosello will be considered a claim province
  • Mallorca will be considered a claim province
  • Canarias will be considered a claim province
  • Napule will be considered a claim province
  • Puglia will be considered a claim province
  • Calavria will be considered a claim province
  • Sicilia will be considered a claim province
  • Sardegna will be considered a claim province
  • Flag graphics set to default
  • Become Spain
  • -2 badboy
  • Event 179082 - Charles VI elected Holy Roman Emperor for Austria will never fire
  • Event 179083 - The Peace of Utrecht for Austria will never fire
  • Event 285215 - The Peace of Utrecht for Spain will never fire
  • Event 170055 - The Peace of Utrecht for France will never fire
  • Event 164017 - The Peace of Utrecht for England will never fire

187003. The Austracist party

HSP — Not random

Triggered by

Action A, B of 179096 - The support to the Austracist party for Austria

Description

The arrival of the Archduke to the coasts of Valencia raised most of the province in his favor, and after the conquest of Barcelona by the English troops, and with the Archduke Charles in the city, most of Catalonia declared her support for him, and he was proclaimed King by the parliament on November 7, 1705. Soon the parliament of Valencia took the same decision. The European war of Spanish succession had just become a civil war in Spain.

Actions

A. Down with the Bourbons

  • Start a war with Spain
  • Global revolt risk +4 for 108 months
  • +11000 infantry in Catalunya
  • +4000 cavalry in Catalunya
  • +11000 infantry in Valencia
  • +4000 cavalry in Valencia
  • +200

Back to top

187002. The Habsburg party abandoned by all

HSP — Not random

Conditions

  • Event 187000 - The parliament of Barcelona declares Charles King for HSP has already occurred

Triggered by

Action A of 179083 - The Peace of Utrecht for Austria

Description

Charles left Spain in 1711 to take the imperial crown, leaving his wife, Elizabeth Christine Brunswick, as the regent. But in 1713 the situation had become untenable. A string of defeats had the Franco-Spanish armies at the doors of Barcelona, and the English had left the war. In March the regent left Barcelona, leaving Stahrenberg to reach an agreement with Felipe, and after surrendering Tarragona, the Austrians left. The people of Barcelona had to take a difficult decision.

Actions

A. We are on our own

  • Break vassalization with Austria
  • Stability +2
  • -25 relations with Austria
  • -25 relations with England
  • castilian will no longer be an accepted culture
  • Flag graphics set to default
  • Become Catalonia

Back to top

187000. The parliament of Barcelona declares Charles King

HSP — Not random

Triggered by

Action A of 285211 - Charles conquers Catalonia for Spain

Description

Felipe V was well accepted in all of Spain, and recognized as King by all the parliaments. However with the start of the war and the arrival of the French troops, and with the proclamation of Charles Habsburg as King in Vienna, his supporters (Austracists), were ready to change sides. Although there were supporters for both monarchs in all regions of Spain, the disenchantment with the Habsburg rule and the admiration for the French centralized model was higher in the former Kingdom of Castile, while in the former Kingdom of Aragon, besides the opposite sentiment, there was a profound hatred of the French for the loss of the Roselló and the bombardment of Barcelona by the French fleet a few years before.

Actions

A. A new King

  • catalan will become an accepted culture
  • Break vassalization with Spain
  • Stability +2
  • Gain a royal marriage with Austria
  • +200 relations with Austria
  • -100 relations with France
  • -250 relations with Spain
